title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 613-1.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 613-1.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to regulate the bulk storage
of petroleum in order to protect public health and the
environment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
613-1.1

Adopted, New

York State Register September 30, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 39, eff. 10/11/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
